title: Drawing, "Chest of Drawers (Four)", ca. 1930s
medium:
Graphite; ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57th STREET/ [torn]EW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions, instructions Inscribed in red color pencil in lower right: P
dimensions:
33.4 x 37.1 cm (13 1/8 x 14 5/8 in.)
Loss, lower left
description:
Four-drawer chest; narrower top and bottom drawers extend to edge on left and right; two middle drawers are indented at sides. Bottom drawer rests on side supports only. Two knobs, positioned left and right, per drawer.
Scale: 1"-1'
